original_title: Israel launches attack on Gaza City — RT World News
article_summary:
"US President Donald Trump suggests a one-on-one meeting between Vladimir Putin and Vladimir Zelensky, with the aim of intensifying bilateral negotiations between Russia and Ukraine, before a potential three-way peace summit. Trump made these comments on Mark Levin's radio show on Tuesday."

"Italian police arrest a Ukrainian man suspected of involvement in the bombing of the Nord Stream gas pipelines in 2022, as German prosecutors believe he led a unit responsible for the explosions."</s>
